# Edward Nelson Jr.

|death_date=
|caption=
|nickname=

Edward Nelson Jr. (March 17, 1931 – June 5, 2018) was a United States Coast Guard rear admiral. He was Superintendent at the United States Coast Guard Academy from June 1982 to June 1986.[https://books.google.com/books?id=NVFAAQAAIAAJ&q=%22nelson,+edward+%22+worcester+1931+coast+guard Supplement to Who's who in America], volume 44, p 645- https://www.uscg.mil/history/uscghist/uscga_history_final.pdf  He retired in 1989 after serving as Commander
of the Seventeenth Coast Guard District. He died in 2018.
